alert.note: Alert for St. Marys (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued November 09 at 12:33PM EST until November 09 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level in low lying areas due to tidal flooding. * WHERE...Shoreline in St. Marys County. * WHEN...Until 4 PM EST this afternoon, especially around the time of high tide. * IMPACTS...Water is expected to go over a portion of the bulkhead near the Straits Point Bridge, and also cover yards in the St. Georges Creek and St. Marys River areas. Minor shoreline inundation up to one half foot above ground is possible elsewhere. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Tides one to one and a half feet above normal. High tide is occurring now. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. St Marys River at Straits Point MLLW Categories - Minor 3.0 ft, Moderate 3.5 ft, Major 5.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.4 ft, Moderate 1.9 ft, Major 3.4 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 09/11 AM 3.0 1.4 1.6 1.0 Minor 09/11 PM 2.7 1.1 1.4 1.0 None 10/11 AM 2.5 0.9 1.1 0.5 None 11/12 AM 2.4 0.8 1.1 1.0 None 11/12 PM 2.6 1.0 1.1 1.0 None 12/12 AM 2.3 0.7 1.0 0.5 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
